message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $15000 by us due to its unique features and the effort put into its creation. I believe it could be a valuable asset to you, given your interests and needs. Would you like to consider acquiring it at this price?

I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price closer to $10000?
